website_summaries.verdict: This Bonsaii shredder is compact, quiet, and operates reliably.
pros: Can shred several pages at the same time
Can do credit cards, staples, and CDs
Good price point for a reliable shredder
cons: Only runs for an hour without stopping
Other Bonsaii shredders can run for longer

customer_reviews.title: Great for making compost from Amazon boxes and Junk Mail
customer_reviews.text: Love this shredder. Have only had for a few weeks but it has surpassed my expectations so far. Bought this shredder mainly to reduce our garbage waste by recycling old Amazon boxes, newspapers and junk mail. It easily handles double-folded cardboard. If you buy for recycling purposes recommend buying Box Cutters from Amazon too so as to make breakdown easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shredder!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another brand shredder I burned up during my end of year file cabinet purge. The main reason for selecting this make and model was its advertised 60 minute sustained shred time and 10 minute cool down with thermal protection feature. Once I work up the energy to shred I don't want to stop just because the machine can't match my enthusiasm. This shredder is awesome!!! It does everything it says it will do, and it is sooooo quiet. I'd give it 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Carol V. N.

customer_reviews.title: awesome shredder
customer_reviews.text: have owned 4 different shredders and every one could do what it said but only for 20 minutes then they would overheat.After that you did good to go 5 minutes without overheating again For me this is the best i have ever used. It was less than the price of 2 of the cheap ones and WOW! I have run it over an hour continuously and it didnt skip a beat.Just kept chewing it up. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and strong
customer_reviews.text: This shredder has a lot of power and easily goes through stacks of stapled paper. It does it quietly and with ease. When not in use, it will switch to low power mode. A simple touch of the capacitive power button brings it instantly back to full power with a pleasant set of notification chimes to let you know it's ready. The bin is large and there is a sub compartment in the bin to hold the CD/DVD shredded material. If you want a no nonsense shredder that actually does what it claims it can do, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS SHREDDER!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing shredder. It just doesn't overheat, which is the biggest humbug with shredders. I shred, shred, shred, with no stoppage. The only time I stop is to empty out the bin. If you make sure you don't "overload" your bin, emptying it out is no problem, and is not messy. The window in front is great. In-between, I'll pull out the drawer and push the rubbish around to make it more level, so I can shred more into the bin. This is so worth the cost. Just a few more dollars than those smaller type shredders that stop sometimes after only 5 minutes. GET IT! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: I. Rementer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best shredder I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shredder I have ever had. I am very happy with it and highly recommend it to all.. BUT, I also purchased a 3-yer warranty with it. After several inquiries, I have yet to receive any prof of my purchased warranty from Square Deal. The price was fir for a 3-year warrantyy, but it is worthless to mewithout proof. Warranty buyer s BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy K. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Our unit broke in the first year, but I have already purchased a second. Once Bonsaii validated our purchase number there was zero hesitation is standing by their product. Any production run will have a few defective units, but not all companies remedy the situation as quickly and professionally as Bonsaii. P.S. Leading up the failure, the unit performed flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Ian McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder.  Just keeps going and going.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shredder. I bought it because I was tired of my old shredder stopping every 5!mins to cool down for 20 minutes. This shredder keeps going and I got through my huge stack of paper in much less time since it has a very long run time before it needs to cool down. I don't think I even had it shut down to cool at all during my large shredding session. Very nice shredder. This is the way they all should perform. I couldn't be happier with the Bonzaii Evershred.
customer_reviews.author: Eveller

customer_reviews.title: Permanently jammed after only 15 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.text: After 15 minutes of shredding the paper jam light came on. I only fed 1-2 sheets at a time. I inspected the paper path from both the top and bottom and no paper shreds were in the blades. Sent emails to customer care. Planning to return asap.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L. Cain PhD

customer_reviews.title: Best Shredder EVER
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were looking for a shredder that would shred cardboard. This is it! Now it's not the fastest shredder you'll find, but it's a beast for shredding paper or cardboard. Why, you may wonder, would someone shred cardboard--well, what do YOU do with all those Amazon boxes? I will let you in on a little gardening secret. If you've ever put together a compost pile, you need greens, like grass clippings, and browns, like dried leaves. The problem is, when it's grass clipping season, you don't have dried leaves. Shredded cardboard makes a great substitute. Our compost pile is roaring! Happy gardening and happy shredding.
customer_reviews.author: D. Spade

customer_reviews.title: the Auto-Off feature stopped working and the unit either turned on and Ran by itself or would Not stop running after the paper
customer_reviews.text: The 3S23 that i purchased cut paper very well but after a short time and little home office usage, the Auto-Off feature stopped working and the unit either turned on and Ran by itself or would Not stop run-in after the paper had passed through and i cleaned it very well and made sure the on/off sensor was not blocked or dirty. I am giving the Amazon Seller "Hommii" a 5 STAR rating for their customer Service and follow through, I am very satisfied by their replies and efforts and I Highly recommend this Seller based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: albert j

customer_reviews.title: NO ASSEMBLY!!! Set up a breeze, function smooth and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Very well packaged. Was worried about the weight and getting it unpacked and put together - but to my pleasant surprise - when I opened the first box there was a second one snug inside and when I opened it and removed the big foam protection I could simply reach in a grab the handles on the side and lift it out. Cut off the shrink wrap - plug in and GO - that was all!!!! Works like a charm - handles paperclips easily and crooked stacks of papers it just grabs and pulls them in. Only minor disappointment is with the wheels - they are maybe good on hard surface but not on a rug.
customer_reviews.author: S. S. Rymer

customer_reviews.title: Super quite and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Very quite, shreds "18" pages at a time and auto reverses to clear jams.I did not really count the sheets of paper each time but it was a goodly number and it handled them efficiently. When it did ja, it was very easy to clear because of the auto reverse that partially ejected the papers so i could remove them to try again. The speed that it pulls in paper is a little slower than shredders that take in only "6" sheets at a time. But since it takes in 3x as much a 10% speed penalty is not bad. Good machine. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JAK421

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend this much on a shredder, because there are so many out there that cost less, and have a larger capacity. But as a want-to-be writer I tend to go through a lot of paper, and a lot of shredders. This one has already lasted longer than any two of the the previous brands that I have owned. If this one were to quit on me tomorrow, I'd just order a new one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Turner

customer_reviews.title: Really good shredder for continuous use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good shredder. If it had two changes, I would have rated it five stars. I do a lot of shredding in my business and have gone through five of them. This one is the quietest by far. The best feature is the continuous operation. Most others overheat after 20 minutes. This one has gone for over an hour. It is as fast as any other. I would like for it to have a larger bin. This one fills up in less than ten minutes. Most other 12 page shredders are at least twice the size. I also would like a "Bin Full" sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: ... this shredder for our office and it has been great. The original one they sent us was working ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchases this shredder for our office and it has been great. The original one they sent us was working great, and then it had a slight malfunction whereby the shredder wouldn't stop unless you turned it off. It still worked, it would simply continue to run after the pages had gone through. I contacted customer service and they were amazing. They helped me troubleshoot the issue, and then sent us a new one and it could not have been easier. Our new shredder is working perfectly and Mia from customer service has been so helpful and kind. A fluke can happen with any product, but the way a company handles it says everything, and Bonsaii has been great.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonArcher

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on schedule. Unpackaged, started using under light duty use. Use every day throughout the day. Has proven to be very reliable. Have not run 18 sheets through it yet, but I have run about 12 sheets and it has performed very well. We have run it for about 30-45 minutes at a time and it has not jamed a single time or overheated. I believe this is a very good product. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handles 12 pages effortlessly and the small shreds are nice to use for packing
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet for a shredder and it automatically turns to stand by within a few seconds of shredding. Handles 12 pages effortlessly and the small shreds are nice to use for packing, burning, or recycling.
customer_reviews.author: slb

customer_reviews.title: Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well this shredder works. I've definitely been putting it through its paces and it has performed really well. Haven't encountered any problems. It's pretty fast for a small machine and you can continuous feed, at least for a little while. It has a pretty good capacity and a sleek design. I've had it about a month and I can definitely recommend it at this point. The only thing I could wish for is that it held a bag, but it's easy enough to empty it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Martin

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy shredder
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk that I will be returning as soon as I can get it packed up. It sounded as worn out and tired straight out of the box as the one I just replaced. It claims to accept up to 14 sheets of paper at once. It chokes on more than 4 sheets. It also does not cross cut as it claims. I have used it for less than an hour since receiving it and it now won't accept another sheet of paper even though it says it is ready to run. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my 15 year old unit that simply quit on me. This one is ultra quiet and provides excellent cross cuts that are more than adequate for home use. It can certainly cut up to 12 sheets but I wouldn't recommend continuous use with that many sheets. The credit card cuts are not as small but they are sufficient. If somebody can put them back together and use them maliciously then they're pretty talented. I'm very happy with this purchase and I believe it will last another 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: RLW in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Handles cardboard with no problem.
customer_reviews.text: We were hesitant to purchase this but I am so glad we did. Its primary use is to shred cardboard boxes (Amazon type and thickness) for the worm farms in the center of our garden towers. Even with the cardboard, it shreds with ease. I just put 3 cut up boxes through and not a problem. It cross cut them with ease and no overheating. Those pieces that were too large to fit through the feeder space will still go in our recycling with a much smaller footprint. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: abb1e

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with this shredder
customer_reviews.text: a few weeks back I broke yet another shredder, because I kept failing to get one sturdy enough to hold up to my usage. This one arrived the other day, and I think its going to be the winner. This thing is leaps and bounds quieter than any other shredder Ive used. It has shown no signs of clogging, and it is tough, smooth, and super easy to use. To test it, I sliced the double cardboard box it came in and the thing ate it up no problem. Should be just fine shredding the junk mail that plagues my life. I would recommend this unit for home or home office use.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Levy

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty machine
customer_reviews.text: we purchased this to shred cardboard boxes (cereal type) to use for compost. it handles the material with ease. is a sturdy, solid machine. includes auto reverse in case there's a jam (which we haven't had). Good packing, remove from box and plug in. haven't shred a CD yet though this is available. recommend it if you have serious shredding
customer_reviews.author: blv56

customer_reviews.title: Speedy capacity at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a micro-shredder to replace my old large-crosscut shredder, but realized I could get faster shredding at a significantly lower cost if I was willing to stick with a crosscut shredder that cut longer strips. very happy with this unit. Quiet & fast. I particularly like the fact it has a second bin for shredding optical media and credit cards and the fact it uses an internal fan to blow air across the cutters, allowing significantly longer operation w/o having to stop for the shredder to cool down.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Superior Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a part of a package deal, (shredder, oil, maintainence paper). Haven't had a chance to really put this through its' paces but the use I have put it through please me. First, VERY QUIET. Takes on multiple papers easily. Only minor disappointment is transferring shredded paper to waste container. A bit sloppy but hopefully with time this will be overcome. Will update as time passes.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit - with some minor issues
customer_reviews.text: August 2106 It seems to be working well. Handles a lot of paper, cuts it up into unrecognizable pieces, and isn't too loud. Update March 2017 It has worked well although for the past month it doesn't stop even after all the pages are shredded. I have to physically turn it off. There must be a sensor that is blocked. Also, it have proven almost impossible to empty out without making a mess. There needs to be a way to put a garbage bag inside before you start shredding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a small business I work for. We returned the last shredder we bought (another brand) because it was so noisy and could not make phone calls in the same room when it was on. I did some research before buying and this one is quiet and does the job - yay! Only downfall is the size. Not too bad, but fills up quickly. Not really a fault of the item, maybe should have purchased a larger model. Highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I love it. That's a very annoying problem however
customer_reviews.text: It's much quieter than my old shredder. It's possibly faster. My one complaint is the bags i've used so far have been difficult to remove from the shredder and have had holes poked in them, causing shreds to "leak" out. Otherwise I love it. That's a very annoying problem however, since I really prefer using bags to collect the shreds. Is there a solution?
customer_reviews.author: John Gerecht

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this shredder aa little over a year ago. It worked perfectly until recently - when pulling out the bin to empty the shredded paper. The unit is top-heavy and tipped back when removing the bin. It lightly fell onto a carpeted surface, but would not turn back on when uprrighted. Customer service suggested several things to try, including videos & exchanging pictures. It was determined that the unit could not be repaired. Bonsaii credited our Amazon account, and have ordered a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: Rock star
customer_reviews.text: Rock star status for a small office. This thing has eaten everything we have thrown at it - CDs, DVDs, paper, & credit cards. The size is not as big as I thought it would be and the unit is very quiet. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KetelOne

customer_reviews.title: Shredding Done Quietly with Bonsaii !
customer_reviews.text: Of course, I was skeptical as there have been many shredders in my lifetime. This Evershred Pro Heavy Duty really does the job it says and with very little noise. The papers go in quick and smooth and do not catch on the cross-cutting gears as other cross hatch shredders I have encountered. This one will be with us doing its job for a long time to come. Thank You for creating this terrific shredder.
customer_reviews.author: CatsCritique

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Shredder!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little shredder! It has a pleasant little tone tune when you turn it on and off. It shreds your papers into nice small pieces & is SUPER quiet! Very easy to pull out the basket to dump & place back in. No complaints so far! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DeezB

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, Great Company.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item back in Dec '18 and it does everything it says it does! It's sleek-looking, quiet and gets the job done. I recently had an issue in July where the shredder kept grinding while in the on the position and wouldn't stop. I contacted the company and they diagnosed that it may be a sensor issue. They immediately sent me a new one at no additional cost. Excellent customer service indeed! Would definitely purchase from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: W. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: A quiet shredder with power
customer_reviews.text: A small powerful shredder that does the job....Great value and it was delivered fast....Packaged very well ,and while I have not had it long ,I believe it will last way past my needs....I used to service office equipment including shredders so I know quality when I see it.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and used some, but not much. Extremely quiet, works great. Would buy again from this manufacturer. Like the five second delay before shutting off, most shreaders are only a couple seconds. This one gives you time to insert the papers again, before shutting down.
customer_reviews.author: NJ tradesman

customer_reviews.title: Sounded great but did not deliver.
customer_reviews.text: The unit did not work right out of the box - I contacted Amazon, the paperwork was simple and the shredder was picked up the next day. I received a credit within a couple of days. Amazon certainly makes returns easy. Despite all the great reviews, descriptions and specifications with the Bonsaii, I remain gun shy regarding this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kenway

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but be mindful that it does not mince your pages. It just cut them in strippes. Short ones, but strippes nevertheless
customer_reviews.author: Magna

customer_reviews.title: Great and continuous shreds without having to cool off.
customer_reviews.text: Great for home use. My father passed and I had a lot of documents that needed to be shredded. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It shreds... much quieter than most, but with a 1" cross-cut
customer_reviews.text: Shreds with a 1" cross-cut into a sizeable bin, and a separate compartment for the remnants from CDs or plastic cards. Also sports a power save mode. Overall, it's a decent unit, with a good shred cycle, but a shorter cross- cut would have been nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: 5 star paper eater
customer_reviews.text: I have shredded staples, Cd's, and stacks of paper. This thing eats and eats. I keep it oiled and I keep the stacks under 15 pages at a time. No issues so far. (Don't forget to empty it because will continue to shred either way. I over stuffed mine.) I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M

customer_reviews.title: Cuts well but things got screwy after a few months ...
customer_reviews.text: Cuts well but things got screwy after a few months. The auto-off switch malfunctioned, so it keeps running until manually switched off. Blades cleaned to ensure no paper is clogging things up. Cutting performance overshadows the switch hassle. I use 8-gallon plastic bags to line the clippings bin--not user friendly design--care needed to avoid tearing bags.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Small Disappointment after 1/2 of shredding
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge shredder, I brought it to get rid of lots of junk mail and I was a little disappointed because only 1/2 hour into scanning. The paper was jamming, good thing I also purchased the lubricated shredding sheets because they were definitely needed. One pass with the lubricant sheets after 1/2 hour of scanning was not what I expected. Other than that the shredder is performing as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Needs Bin Full Shutoff.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the value and sound decibels. Needs a shut off to remind you not to overfill the basket. Returned 1st unit because it filled up and stuck in feeder shoot. Resulting in narrowing amounts of paper it will feed. They sent another and both units performed well. But, DO Not overfill it! Sounds easy but with our office having customer files from 1997, with Tons of paper... shred, shed, shred.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use. Quiet. Powerful. Automatic works perfectly. Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Best automatic shredder I have owned so far. Silent. Powerful. Not expensive. Works every time. Should have bought to of them for when this one wears out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Just about tore a nickel that slipped into the feeder, up. Had to do surgery to get it out but this shredder is very durable and that's saying a lot since I worked for a global shred corporation for 17 years!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Quiet, Fast shredder, Runs Cool, Jam reverses documents out.
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is amazing! It is very quiet and works very well. If it is ever going to jam, it just kicks into reverse to give you the ability to pull your fat stack out. I know because I have overfed it, but still no jams. I read many reviews on this shredder and all the good things are true! Would buy another one if I ever need to.
customer_reviews.author: William A Flournoy

customer_reviews.title: Great product. We grind a lot of stuff and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We grind a lot of stuff and this is a work horse! We've used it a lot and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Glena S.

customer_reviews.title: Inoperable upon receipt.
customer_reviews.text: The shredder would not progress past the blinking red light stage after it was plugged in and powered on. There's a small extension on the right side of the paper drawer (as you face the unit). This extension contacts the safety switch that keeps the shredder from running when the drawer is not in place. I taped a small, 1/16th inch, sliver of wood to the extension. This allowed the switch to be engaged when the drawer was in place. The unit has been functioning correctly since.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Desautels

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had one single problem with it after a couple months. I like the credit card shredder with its own little basket. Very handy. I'm not really sure how many sheets it'll handle at a time since I just use it for mail and what not, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet. Motor starts to change sound at 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet. Motor starts to change sound at 4 sheets, but handles more. Owners manual doesn't mention oil requirements yet they sell lubricating sheets.
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: It's light weight
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's light weight so it's small enough that I can easily slide it under my desk when not in use. I live in a high rise condo in Hawaii where size and versatility matters.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy shredder, stylish and clean to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my first shredder from this manufacturer. I bought it to replace a Fellows shredder in my office. So far, it seems sturdy, reliable and easy to use, clean and efficiently emptied. The design is notably stylish and it tweets when ready., which is silly but also pleasantly friendly.
customer_reviews.author: isecond

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull Shredder
customer_reviews.text: After finding out how slow the entry level shredders are, I decided to go with this one and I'm glad I did; it saved me a lot of time. Perfect for home/small office use. I got the 3S-30 model
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerGuru

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: I love this shreader. It gives me peace of mind to know my documents are desposed of when needed. It is worth the money. I would gift this to someone. Efficient well made product.
customer_reviews.author: taro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder. I can't believe how quiet it is
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shredder. I can't believe how quiet it is. Our old shredder was a pain to use and would only work for approximately 10-15 minutes before having to stop for a cool down period. When the Bonsaii EverShred Pro 3S30 was delivered, I put it right to work straight out of the box. I had boxes of items that had accumulated that needed to be shredded. I sat for almost 3 hours and shredded things non-stop. The only break was when I emptied the full bin. It worked like a champ! Best $$ EVER spent on a small shredder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big jobs.
customer_reviews.text: In 48 hours I was able to knock out over 25 years of paperwork and this thing never skipped a beat. So far I love this shredder. Keep plenty of lubricant on hand because you'll want to keep it maintained.
customer_reviews.author: Alex mack

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this over a year and it works great! Chops paper into confetti. Can put a few sheets in at a time, shreds credit cards, cd’s. Ticks away under desk when not in use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: yvettemarie16

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder
customer_reviews.text: Have not had an issue. However have not used it much. I did buy the lubricant sheets to keep product maintenance. Will provide another updated review within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: LadyA-Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shredder
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a shredder for years. I finally found the perfect one. This shredder is silent sturdy and shreds everything. Easy to use and does not overheat. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid shredder. We like the strong motor that has a respectable run time before shutting down to cool off. It handles a decent amount of paper, though like every other shredder company, it’s never as much as they advertise. Our main complaint about this shredder is it’s on the slow side. We expected for this price it would also have some speed behind it. That’s the reason for 4 stars versus 5.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Working overtime
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely constructed machine. Works perfectly. My wife has shredded just about everything in the house. Shredding makes her happy she says.....Works without a hiccup. Happy wife = Happy life
customer_reviews.author: Treemonkey

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job! I use it on a regular basis
customer_reviews.text: I have this shredder for over a year, maybe two. Still loving it! Does a great job! I use it on a regular basis. Definitely would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo A. Bath

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Had it for two weeks. It's cut a ton of paper and CD's. No jambs, no smoke, no noise,,, well, very little noise. This is about the quietest machines I've ever heard. Also, I did shred continuously for an hour. No problems. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SBB

customer_reviews.title: Cooling Fan! Great Shredder!!
customer_reviews.text: A fan. A great way to minimize the problem of over-heating shredders. The quality of the shredder is excellent. The quality of the shred is very good. We have been using it for some time and are very happy with it. Highly recommended. Make sure to keep the blades lubricated as instructed in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: nioa

customer_reviews.title: Love this shredder
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our household. Very quiet, empties easily. Just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Petty’s

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Bonsaii
customer_reviews.text: I received my shredder today. After filling the basket once, I begin to notice a sharp, squeaky noise. I had only been shredding paper (no cards or cds) and a few sheets at a time. The noise just got louder and more annoying. (See video) I couldn't tolerated it any more and packed it back up to be returned. I am going to try a replacement to see if I have the same issue. If so, I will be taking a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So QUIET
customer_reviews.text: I've had at least 5 other paper shredders over the years and this one is BY FAR the best. The other shredders were so loud that it sounded like you were putting a cat through a diesel powered leaf mulcher. This one is so quiet, you can operate it while talking on the phone. It also does a very good job of shredding, which is nice. The price is a bit higher than the basic entry level shredder, but if it lasts, it will be well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Machine noise is just a murmur
customer_reviews.text: Additional noise is sound of thick papers being shredded. I've only had this machine for three days and I'm loving it. Already cleared out two three cabinet drawers full of files. I tried to remove all staples but did miss a few with no problem. Can't attest to longevity but performance so far is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is great for our small office. The only reason i gave it 4 stars is because the "teeth" are hard to get to if you have a jam. This may actually be a safety feature. The first one I ordered had problems. After brief troubleshooting with the company they promptly sent me a new. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lhud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shredding!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Great for small home based business and devouring mail to thwart identity thieves!!! It's powerful, quiet and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Heather P.

customer_reviews.title: so good. Other shredders seem to shut off so quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Other shredders seem to shut off so quickly due to overheating. Haven't had that problem with the Bonsaii. 2 yrs later... something went wrong after about a year And can only shred a few papers before the opening seems to close up and not allow any more papers to go through. Prior to that it did work great but hoped it would last longer than a year. Anyone else have that problem?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small machine. The only thing that would be perfect is an automatic feeder. Used it for 20 minutes straight one time at varying paper thicknesses didn't overheat and is relatively quiet.
customer_reviews.author: LArry P

customer_reviews.title: It Shreds Well and Does It Quiet
customer_reviews.text: My old shredder died and I bought this to replace it. It performs up to high expectations and is even more quiet than I thought it would be. Large capacity bin. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parkman

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job
customer_reviews.text: It does a nice job but no way it will handle 18 pages at a time. Runs a long time and it has a nice large bin.
customer_reviews.author: Flagal

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Not long after we got it, it started to malfunction. The plastic around the area where you insert the paper cracked. It still works, but will probably break apart at the crack, before all is said & done.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Large capacity. Quiet. Will last longer than any other brand shredder (4 hrs) per session.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Finally a shredder that works
customer_reviews.text: It does what it claims and is a huge step up from the cheaper shredders. Like 1000x better. Really like this product for my small office team.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wageman

customer_reviews.title: I love this shredder!
customer_reviews.text: It is quiet, strong, and easy to operate. Easy to empty the basket when it is full. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth K

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: The shredder runs quieter than any Shredder I've had is durable a good Shredder for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S

customer_reviews.title: Highlights
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinary product. Easy to use, does everything they say it will do and even more.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Laurentiu M. Boeru

customer_reviews.title: A work horse
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, heavy, quiet. Goes about the job in workman like fashion. After only a week or two use, I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Blue Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. Does a great job. Has a separate credit card shredding spot. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: pomeranians

customer_reviews.title: Silent and Secure
customer_reviews.text: Quietest machine yet. Shreds just about anything efficiently and silently.
customer_reviews.author: BillS

customer_reviews.title: Bonsaii the Robot Shredder
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I don't do a lot of shredding, so I have not tested many sheets at a time, but it works well with four or five sheets. I love the "robotic" sounds it makes when is turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Maranbo

customer_reviews.title: we like how quiet it is
customer_reviews.text: It is very quiet, goes for a long time before it gets hot, then a fan turns on. We like the cute beeps. Also easy to move around. I've tried keeping a plastic bag in it but it works better without one and then you have to empty in to a bigger bag.
customer_reviews.author: lizzys_pace

customer_reviews.title: Auto Stop A Problem
customer_reviews.text: Purchased May 2016 and shredder ran perfectly until about 8 months ago when the auto stop no longer worked. No help from Bonsaii, manual does not list problem under troubleshooting. After numerous attempts to fix by cleaning the shredder head and paper sensor area (as recommended on YouTube) I have given up and manually turn the unit off and on. Otherwise unit works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: It's worth it to spend a little more on a shredder that works well. My cheap-o Amazon brand was noisy and the auto-off stopped working right away. Had to hand feed and turn it off each time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn MacGeraghty

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder.  But needs swivel wheels.
customer_reviews.text: This shredder has the muscle to get the normal office jobs done AND it's pretty quiet too. It's a pleasure to run it compared to my older shredder. My only regret is the wheels. They are fixed permanently in the side to side direction. So the unit moves smoothly on the floor from side to side. But if you want to move it forward or back, you better pick it up or you'll scratch the floor. This thing really needs swivel wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Dale M Weston

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty for home
customer_reviews.text: Love this shredder! It is a heavy duty shredder allowing multiple pages at a time! Keep it lubricated to make your shredding faster!
customer_reviews.author: Heinz57

customer_reviews.title: A beast!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shreader. It made short work of the 2 large boxes of documents I have somehow managed to save up over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: So glad I upgraded to this one. So far so great. Quiet as can be, and eats the paper effortlessly. I do a good amount of document shredding, so I hope that the quality I'm seeing so far lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Lina D

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty shredder
customer_reviews.text: After going through 3 shredders we purchased this one and it works amazingly well. No problems whatsoever. Heavy duty. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: myamie1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shredder!!
customer_reviews.text: This shredder is the best one I’ve had. I’ve gone through two cheap ones. Even though this one was more expensive, it is worth it!! It doesn’t jam like the others did.
customer_reviews.author: KCourson

customer_reviews.title: Just get it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It just won’t stop and munches through the toughest of jobs. I’ve now recycled all of the other shredders in the house - off to the electronics scrap heap for them. No more stopping to cool down after 10 mins! I’ve happily shredded stuff for 45 mins without a single delay.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shredder! I’ve seen where people are complaining about it being a mess to clean up when dumping the shred so I was worried about that, but if you pay attention to how much is in the shred box and clean it when it’s full, there is no problem at all. Love it! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bodey

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the product. Yes, it is expensive but it is very useful. You can use it for really long time and the best thing is that it makes so less noise. This product is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Runs very quiet and seems to do a great job chopping up paper
customer_reviews.text: Runs very quiet and seems to do a great job chopping up paper
customer_reviews.author: bob doop

customer_reviews.title: Nice shredder- so quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how much quieter this is than my previous shredder. Works well, compact, looks nicer than most other shredders. Glad I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best shredder I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best shredder I've ever bought!! It's very quiet, and I was surprised at how much I could shred before I had to let it cool down.
customer_reviews.author: DKM

product_meta.title: Bonsaii EverShred Pro 3S16 12-Sheet Heavy Duty Cross-Cut Paper/CD/Credit Card Shredder, 58 dB Low Operation Noise, Pullout Basket and 4 Casters, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Advanced Cooling System: 60 MINUTES CONTINUOUS RUNNING TIME 
The Bonsaii Evershred Pro 3S16 is a high quality and quiet 12-sheet cross-cut shredder for all your mass documents including paper, old credit, debit, insurance, and identification cards and even CD/DVD continuously for up to 60 minutes while only need a 10-minute rest with a patented cooling-down system which provides the ultimate shredding experience and is unsurpassed in this area of the market. 
Cool air is circulated and hot air is expelled to ensure the cutting system is always working at the ideal temperature for the highest shredding performance. Try this high reliability shredding technology and forget about waiting for your machine to cool down again.


Patented Cutting Technology 
Bonsaii Evershred Pro 3S16 provides you with the ultimate solution for reliable and durable document destruction with high performance solid cutters. High precision engineering creates the unsurpassed cutting quality and higher security; this ensures your confidential, financial and sensitive documents are shredded into 5/32 by 1 3/8 inches (4mm x 35mm) (Security Level P-4) to prevent thieves stealing your data and potentially your identity and money. You will never feel so easy to get back to your life with the peace of mind that your confidential information is safe. 


Anti-jam Technology
This machine is equipped with an ultra-reliable and ultra-durable automatic anti-jam system. Advanced jam detection automatically reverses the machine when over-loading to prevent the jam happening in the first place. Jamming of shredders cause wasted time, frustration and cleaning up of shredded paper waste, Bonsaii 3S16 solution with highly sophisticated and reliable anti-jam technology always protects the machine from overloading.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty shredder that can continuous shredding up to 60 minutes without stopping for mass documents destroying;Quiet operation :58 dB low noise level will give you a quiet and smooth shredding exprience
High-security cross-cut paper shredder with 12 sheets (Letter Size, 75g/m²) shredding capacity; Shreds paper into tiny particles measuring 5/32 by 1 3/8 inches (4mm x 35mm) ,Security level P-4.
Shreds paper, credit card, CD/DVD, clips, staples;Shredding speed reaches 7.2 feet per minute;Backed by 3 years warranty.

Jam protection system with auto start and auto reverse to protect you from the frustration of paper jams, overheating and overloading protection technology to keep sustainable using the shredder and prolong its lifetime

4.2 gallons large pull-out wastebasket capacity for easy emptying, a 0.37 gallons separate small bin for CD/DVD and credit card pieces collection, and the transparent window makes it easy to see when wastebasket is full. Equiped with the casters, heavy duty shredder can be moved flexibly.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars196 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
